Actions.Name: Piercing Shard
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 is vulnerable and must save. On a failed save, they take 1 piercing damage for each space they move until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Riven
Actions.Description: Mark a character in range 8. At the end of that character's turn, if they are still marked, they take [D] piercing damage, once, for every 3 spaces of distance between them and the justicar. Then, clear the mark.
